channel.title: How can i add a crown for the owner when he ::yells?
channel.description: iv got the yell code working for both players and owners, how do i add a crown to the yell of an owner? thanks

item.title: How can i add a crown for the owner when he ::yells?

item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

item.title: How can i add a crown for the owner when he ::yells?
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

[quote=“warxscape, post:5, topic:527379”][quote author=RunePKn00b link=topic=646126.msg4345212#msg4345212 date=1375765305]
could i see your command code for the owner yell?
[/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“talk”)) {
if (!Connection.isMuted©) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("@red@[OWNER]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}
}

this i added in the owners commands only, in the public commands i copied this exactly but replace “talk” with “yell”, and “OWNER” to “Yell” and the colour[/quote] in my source we add "<img=1> (for gold crown) and <img=0> (for silver crown>
since this is owner I’m guessing you want the gold one so try this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("talk")) { if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<img=1>@red@[OWNER]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } }

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add a crown for the owner when he ::yells?
item.dc:creator: @warxscape warxscape
item.description:
@warxscape wrote:

RunePKn00b:

could i see your command code for the owner yell?

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“talk”)) {
if (!Connection.isMuted©) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("@red@[OWNER]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}
}

this i added in the owners commands only, in the public commands i copied this exactly but replace “talk” with “yell”, and “OWNER” to “Yell” and the colour
